data.title: Netsuite for Retail Software Review
data.meta_description: Netsuite for Retail is a retail management software solution that works across the cloud to maintain both online and rick and mortar retail channels.
data.text:
RETAIL MANAGEMENT

Netsuite for Retail Review

About Netsuite for Retail

Netsuite for Retail is a retail management software solution that works across the cloud to maintain both online and rick and mortar retail channels. The program can complete all in-person and online POS transactions and track each customer’s personal purchasing history. Users can then pull up this CRM data and initiate loyalty rewards for the most active shoppers.

For inventory, the system can track stock levels at all locations, place orders with suppliers and issue item transactions between different locations. The product can compare retail performance against industry KPIs, and users can generate a variety of retail reports. Lastly, Netsuite for Retail allows users to fully customize the ecommerce experience for shoppers.

About the Company

NetSuite was founded in 1998 and has its headquarters in San Mateo, CA – right in the heart of Silicon Valley. Its nine offices span the globe, with locations in Europe, Canada, Australia and Asia. Gartner named NetSuite one of the top 10 the fastest growing financial management solution, and they’ve received four CODiE Awards from the Software and Information Industry Association in the past two years.

Netsuite for Retail Key Features
